scripts.test: npm run test-unit && npm run test-integration
scripts.test-unit: npm run test-unit:js && npm run test-unit:react-native
scripts.test-unit:js: lerna run build --scope kinvey-js-sdk --stream && lerna run test --scope kinvey-js-sdk --stream
scripts.test-unit:react-native: lerna run build --scope kinvey-react-native-sdk --stream && lerna run test --scope kinvey-react-native-sdk --stream
scripts.test-integration: npm run test-integration:html5 && npm run test-integration:nativescript && npm run test-integration:node
scripts.test-integration:html5: cd tests/integration/html5 && npm i --no-audit && npm test
scripts.test-integration:nativescript: cd tests/integration/nativescript && npm i --no-audit && npm test
scripts.test-integration:node: cd tests/integration/node && npm i --no-audit && npm test
